channel.title: [PI] Please Help [317]
channel.description:
Well I removed the timer, and when you come out of the wildy now, it still has that skull with the cross bones on the bottom right and it doesnt go away, and it still shows the "Attack" right click option on other players, but when you hit attack it says "This player is not in the wildnerness." or whatever, but how can I resolve this problem ? Still needing help!
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img94/7280/number1hb.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img547/2968/number2o.jpg[/img]

item.title: [PI] Please Help [317]
item.dc:creator: @Creative_I Creative I
item.description:
@Creative_I wrote:

[quote=“mr extremez, post:12, topic:520270”][quote author=Creative I link=topic=638769.msg4308496#msg4308496 date=1370329825]

I believe that you removing the timer made this always true and pk is enabled everywhere now, btw dont edit your threads to closed just add [Resolved] in the title so that if other people need help with their problems they can refer to your threads

It didnt make pking allowed everywhere, when you try to attack out of the wild it says “This player is not in the wilderness”. I just want to figure out how to fix the solution that when you step out of the wilderness it goes back to normal.

[/quote]It’s against the rules to remove your post and repost it.[/quote]

Didnt know sorry :eek:, just I’ve been having this problem and no one can help me resolve it.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Please Help [317]
item.dc:creator: @Creative_I Creative I
item.description:
@Creative_I wrote:

[quote=“mr extremez, post:6, topic:520270”]On of those are activating the loading thing… Just remove one and see if it fixes it. Those are in process() btw.

} else if (getPA().inPitsWait()) { getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Loading...", 1); }else if (!inCwWait) { getPA().sendFrame99(0); getPA().walkableInterface(-1); getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Loading...", 1); }[/quote]

This worked but the problem now is, that the 8 second timer when you get out of the wildy, gets stuck on 1 second

Read full topic

@mr_extremez wrote:

On of those are activating the loading thing… Just remove one and see if it fixes it. Those are in process() btw.

} else if (getPA().inPitsWait()) { getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Loading...", 1); }else if (!inCwWait) { getPA().sendFrame99(0); getPA().walkableInterface(-1); getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Loading...", 1); }

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Please Help [317]
item.dc:creator: @Creative_I Creative I
item.description:
@Creative_I wrote:

[quote=“mr extremez, post:4, topic:520270”]My base is highly changed from what yours would look like but default pi should have something like this in process,

if (inWild()) { int modY = getAbsY() > 6400 ? getAbsY() - 6400 : getAbsY(); wildLevel = (((modY - 3520) / 8) + 1); if (!inCw()) { getPA().walkableInterface(197); } //playMusic(332); if (Config.SINGLE_AND_MULTI_ZONES) { if (inMulti()) { getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: " + wildLevel, 199); } else { getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: " + wildLevel, 199); } } else { getPA().multiWay(-1); getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: " + wildLevel, 199); } if (!CastleWars.isInCwWait(this)) { getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack"); } } else if (CastleWars.isInCw(this)) { if (!CastleWars.isInCwWait(this)) { getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack"); } } else if (FightPits.inPitsGame(this)) { getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack"); getPA().walkableInterface(2804); } else if (FightPits.inPitsLobby(this)) { getPA().walkableInterface(6673); } else if (BarbarianAssault.inLobby(this)) { getPA().walkableInterface(6673); } else if (inPcBoat()) { getPA().walkableInterface(21119); } else if (inPcGame()) { getPA().walkableInterface(21100); } else if (inDuelArena()) { getPA().walkableInterface(201); if (duelStatus == 5) { getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack"); } else { getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Challenge"); } } else if (inBarrows()) { mapData(false); getPA().sendFrame126("Kill Count: " + barrowsKillCount, 4536); getPA().walkableInterface(4535); } else if (isInGWD()) { getPA().walkableInterface(16210); } else if (inCwGame) { getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack"); } else if (getItems().playerHasEquipped(3, 4566)) { getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Whack"); } else if (getPA().inPitsWait()) { getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Null"); } else if (!inCwWait) { if (!isInGWD()) { getPA().sendFrame99(0); getPA().walkableInterface(-1); getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Null"); } }

Which is what I was looking for.[/quote]

Here ill post it in pastebin for you again.

http://pastebin.com/MqmTQzWf

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Please Help [317]
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

My base is highly changed from what yours would look like but default pi should have something like this in process,

if (inWild()) { int modY = getAbsY() > 6400 ? getAbsY() - 6400 : getAbsY(); wildLevel = (((modY - 3520) / 8) + 1); if (!inCw()) { getPA().walkableInterface(197); } //playMusic(332); if (Config.SINGLE_AND_MULTI_ZONES) { if (inMulti()) { getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: " + wildLevel, 199); } else { getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: " + wildLevel, 199); } } else { getPA().multiWay(-1); getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: " + wildLevel, 199); } if (!CastleWars.isInCwWait(this)) { getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack"); } } else if (CastleWars.isInCw(this)) { if (!CastleWars.isInCwWait(this)) { getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack"); } } else if (FightPits.inPitsGame(this)) { getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack"); getPA().walkableInterface(2804); } else if (FightPits.inPitsLobby(this)) { getPA().walkableInterface(6673); } else if (BarbarianAssault.inLobby(this)) { getPA().walkableInterface(6673); } else if (inPcBoat()) { getPA().walkableInterface(21119); } else if (inPcGame()) { getPA().walkableInterface(21100); } else if (inDuelArena()) { getPA().walkableInterface(201); if (duelStatus == 5) { getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack"); } else { getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Challenge"); } } else if (inBarrows()) { mapData(false); getPA().sendFrame126("Kill Count: " + barrowsKillCount, 4536); getPA().walkableInterface(4535); } else if (isInGWD()) { getPA().walkableInterface(16210); } else if (inCwGame) { getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack"); } else if (getItems().playerHasEquipped(3, 4566)) { getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Whack"); } else if (getPA().inPitsWait()) { getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Null"); } else if (!inCwWait) { if (!isInGWD()) { getPA().sendFrame99(0); getPA().walkableInterface(-1); getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Null"); } }

Which is what I was looking for.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Please Help [317]
item.dc:creator: @Creative_I Creative I
item.description:
@Creative_I wrote:

mr extremez:

Find your client.java in your source then post your process() method.

Is this the code you needed ?

	public void process() {
applyFollowing();
 
if(followId > 0) {
 
getPA().followPlayer(playerIndex);
 
} else if (followId2 > 0) {
 
getPA().followNpc();
 
}
if(ClickItem.flowerTime == 0) {
getPA().removeObject(ClickItem.flowerX, ClickItem.flowerY);
getPA().objectToRemove(ClickItem.flowerX, ClickItem.flowerY); 
ClickItem.flowerTime = -1;
ClickItem.flowerX = 0;
ClickItem.flowerY = 0;
}
if (ClickItem.flowers == 2980) {
floweritem = 2460;
} else if (ClickItem.flowers == 2981) {
floweritem = 2462;
} else if (ClickItem.flowers == 2982) {
floweritem = 2464;
} else if (ClickItem.flowers == 2983) {
floweritem = 2466;
} else if (ClickItem.flowers == 2984) {
floweritem = 2468;
} else if (ClickItem.flowers == 2985) {
floweritem = 2470;
} else if (ClickItem.flowers == 2986) {
floweritem = 2472;
} else if (ClickItem.flowers == 2987) {
floweritem = 2474;
}
if(seedtimer > 0) {
            seedtimer --;
        }
    if(ClickItem.flowerTime > 0) {
            ClickItem.flowerTime --;
        }

 int totalz = (getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[1]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[4]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[6]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[7]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[8]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[9]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[10]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[11]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[12]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[13]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[14]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[15]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[16]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[17]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[18]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[19]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[20]));;
for (int d = 0; d <= 10; d++) {
if (totalz >= ranks[d]) {
if (d == 0) {
if (d == 0) {
playerRank = d+1;
ranks[d] = totalz;
rankPpl[d] = playerName;
}else if (d < 10){
if (totalz < ranks[d-1]) {
playerRank = d+1;
ranks[d] = totalz;
rankPpl[d] = playerName;
}
}else{
if (totalz < ranks[d-1]) {
playerRank = 0;
}
}
}
} 
}
	if(dungRest > 0) {
			dungRest --;
		}
	getPA().sendFrame126(""+dungPoints+"", 18071);
	FetchDice();
	for (int d = 0; d <= 10; d++) {
		if (totalz >= ranks[d]) {
			if (d == 0) {
			if (d == 0) {
				playerRank = d+1;
				ranks[d] = totalz;
				rankPpl[d] = playerName;
			}else if (d < 10){
				if (totalz < ranks[d-1]) {
					playerRank = d+1;
					ranks[d] = totalz;
					rankPpl[d] = playerName;
				}
			}else{
				if (totalz < ranks[d-1]) {
					playerRank = 0;
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

Read full topic
